Summary: white-looking, (not a shooting star) might be an invasion because it was less than a mile away.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Poplarville
There were no other sightings in Poplarville on or around November 22nd 2006
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my mom's car, when I saw this weird looking object.I told her to stop, but she didn't beleive me when I said it was undoubtedly a UFO.I tried to tell her the truth, but, she STILL wouldn't beleive me.I first noticed it when I was looking for constellations in the sky.From that day, I still look up to see more.The only luck I had was that invasion warning.I think they were trying to communicate with us.I still research aliens from that day.All my feelings and reactions were fear,curiosity,and surprise.I lost sight of it when I looked away to tell my mother,(the one who didn't beleive me),but I still haven't seen another sighting like this one.
